alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 20 at 3:54PM AKST until November 20 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...STRONG WINTER STORM WILL CONTINUE TO IMPACT THE NORTHERN HALF OF THE PANHANDLE ... As of 3 pm, snow reports from around Southeast Alaska have ranged from 6 to 21 inches with this system. The rain-snow will steadily move north through the night with major accumulations ending by morning for all but the far northern inner channels. High winds in downtown Juneau will persist overnight, resulting in continued blizzard conditions there. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Admiralty Island. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather.
